entry.title: neelam-bind/markdown-previwer: This project is a lightweight, web-based Markdown previewer built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It leverages Marked.js to convert Markdown input into HTML in real time and Highlight.js to add syntax highlighting to code blocks
entry.content: This project is a lightweight, web-based Markdown previewer built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It leverages Marked.js to convert Markdown input into HTML in real time and Highlight.js to add syntax highlighting to code blocks

entry.title: geeth24/hypergo: A lightweight, self-hosted URL shortening service designed for internal team use. Create memorable shortcuts to frequently accessed resources within your organization.
entry.content: A lightweight, self-hosted URL shortening service designed for internal team use. Create memorable shortcuts to frequently accessed resources within your organization.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: eversonl/claude-config-manager: A lightweight, command-line tool for managing Claude Desktop MCP (Model Context Protocol) configurations. This tool makes it easy to toggle MCP servers on and off, create preset configurations, and manage backups.

entry.title: Amitava-Roy/Gen-AI-Analytics: This project is a lightweight backend service that simulates an AI-powered data query system. It processes **natural language queries** and converts them into **SQLite queries** to fetch mock sales data.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight backend service that simulates an AI-powered data query system. It processes **natural language queries** and converts them into **SQLite queries** to fetch mock sales data.
